mapper.select: SELECT board_title, board_date, board_no, mname as name, commentcount FROM boardview

SELECT board_no, board_title, board_content, board_date, mid, mname as name, commentcount FROM boardview WHERE board_no=#{board_no }
AND mno=(SELECT mno FROM member WHERE mid=#{mid })
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM board WHERE board_no=#{board_no } AND mno=(SELECT mno FROM member WHERE mid=#{mid })
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (c_comment, board_no, mno) VALUES(#{c_comment }, #{board_no }, (SELECT mno FROM member WHERE mid=#{mid }) )
